entry.title: PuDB, the IDE debugger without an IDE!
entry.summary:
Description

Montreal, QC, September 14, 2015 - Jordi Gutiérrez Hermoso presents PuDB, a full-screen, console-based visual debugger for Python.

  • About Jordi: http://sflx.ca/jordi
  • About PuDB: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pudb

Recorded and edited live by @ChristianAubry at Montréal Python 54 (MP54: Virtualized

Utopia) with a little big help from Savoir-faire Linux (http://sflx.ca/jobs).

  • About MP54: http://sflx.ca/MP54e

entry.title: doitlive: shell demo magic for the masses
entry.summary:
Description

Montreal, Sept. 23, 2014 - Amaze your friends! Type like a hacker! Jordi Gutiérrez Hermoso teaches you how to smash the keyboard and witness l33t h4xx0rz c0adz unfold before your eyes! Great parlour trick, and if you want something more boring, great way to do live shell demos.

Useful links:

  • doitlive: http://sflx.ca/doitlive
  • Jordi: http://sflx.ca/jordi
  • MP48: http://sflx.ca/mp48e
  • Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
  • Savoir-faire Linux: http://sflx.ca/jobs

entry.title: Changeset Evolution in Mercurial
entry.summary:
Description

Montreal, March 10, 2014 - Mathematician and free coder Jordi Gutiérrez Hermoso explains how the evolve extension which implements the ChangesetEvolution concept in Mercurial allows for graceful handling history rewriting operations in this revision control software.

  • evolve extension: http://sflx.ca/evolve
  • Source of this talk: http://hg.octave.org/evolve-talk
  • Jordi: http://sflx.ca/jordi
  • MP44: http://sflx.ca/mp44e
  • Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
  • Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com

entry.title: Django REST framework: the good & the bad
entry.summary:
Summary

Have you ever spent way too much time writing an API, and hoped there was a better way? Well, there is! The Django REST Framework (DRF) is a very generic framework for simplifying the creation of your API. In this talk, we will present how the DRF puts together serializers, validators, views, and everything else together into a flexible tool for creating any kind of REST API you may want. Like any framework, there are certain things it makes difficult to do, and we will talk about the problems we faced and solved while making our API do just what we wanted it to do.
